H0.text: An element is produced when potassium and bromine atoms form chemical bonds.

H1.text: A mixture is produced when potassium and bromine atoms form chemical bonds.

H2.text: A compound is produced when potassium and bromine atoms form chemical bonds.

H3.text: A new form of matter is produced when potassium and bromine atoms form chemical bonds.
